property.name: isValid
property.shortdesc: Returns true if the object specifier resolves to valid objects.

property.name: parent
property.shortdesc: The parent of the InnerGlowSetting (a TransparencySetting, StrokeTransparencySetting, FillTransparencySetting or ContentTransparencySetting).

property.name: applied
property.shortdesc: If true, the inner glow effect is applied.

property.name: blendMode
property.shortdesc: The blending mode for the inner glow effect.

property.name: opacity
property.shortdesc: The opacity of the inner glow (as a percentage). (Range: 0 to 100)

property.name: noise
property.shortdesc: The amount (as a percentage) of noise applied to the inner glow. (Range: 0 to 100)

property.name: effectColor
property.shortdesc: The color applied to the inner glow, specified as a swatch (color, gradient, tint, or mixed ink), or as an array of color values. The color mode dictates the array values: for RGB, specify three values, each in the range 0 to 255, in the format [R,G,B]; for CMYK, specify four values, each as a percentage and each in the range 0 to 100, in the format [C,M,Y,K]; for LAB, specify three values in the format [L,A,B], with L in the range 0 to 100 and A and B in the range -128 to 127.

property.name: technique
property.shortdesc: The technique used for the inner glow.

property.name: spread
property.shortdesc: The amount of spread (as a percentage of the inner glow size). (Range: 0 to 100)

property.name: size
property.shortdesc: The size of the inner glow.

property.name: source
property.shortdesc: The light source of the inner glow effect.

property.name: properties
property.shortdesc: A property that allows setting of several properties at the same time.

method.name: toSource
method.shortdesc: Generates a string which, if executed, will return the InnerGlowSetting.

method.name: getElements
method.shortdesc: Resolves the object specifier, creating an array of object references.

parameters.name: handler
parameters.shortdesc: The event handler. Can accept: File or JavaScript Function.

parameters.name: handler
parameters.shortdesc: The registered event handler. Can accept: File or JavaScript Function.
